content.raw:
Seems to work! I think there should probably be some padding on the bottom of the buttons though. The rest of the interface looks different on windows \(see below\) so comparatively, the buttons look odd when compared to the other buttons, and given the space that seems to exist above the buttons on windows.

![runviewer\_pull\_request\_23.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/AeyynE/images/3992067001-runviewer_pull_request_23.png 'runviewer\_pull\_request\_23.png')
content.html: Seems to work! I think there should probably be some padding on the bottom of the buttons though. The rest of the interface looks different on windows (see below) so comparatively, the buttons look odd when compared to the other buttons, and given the space that seems to exist above the buttons on windows.
